definitions: the imposition of strenuous, often humiliating, tasks as part of a program of rigorous physical training and initiation

examples.text: army cadets were hospitalized for injuries caused by hazing

shortDefinitions: imposition of strenuous tasks as part of program of rigorous physical training and initiation

definitions: humiliating and sometimes dangerous initiation rituals, especially as imposed on college students seeking membership to a fraternity or sorority

examples.text: seven officers of the fraternity were charged with hazing

shortDefinitions: humiliating and sometimes dangerous initiation rituals
